Articles.Content:
Hi,

I was using ksp yesterday which worked fine with these mods, https://ibb.co/iCjFA7

Then today I go to play KSP and all I get is a black screen, I've tried playing with no mods I still get the black screen.

I uninstalled it, then installed it with no mods and still get the black screen. Any Ideas?

Here is my system info:

OS: Linux Mint 18.3 Cinnamon 64-bit

Cinnamon version: 3.6.7

Linux Kernel: 4.13.0-32-generic

Processor: Intel Core i7-5557U CPU @ 3.10GHz x 2

Memory: 15.6 GB

Hard Drives: 946.8

Graphics Card : Intel Corporation Broadwell-U Intergrated Graphics

 

 

Don't worry it's working now
Moved thread to the Technical Support (PC/Modded) area of the forum.
